website_summaries.verdict: This portable product provides a sleek and lightweight option for buyers wanting an in-home cart.
pros: Crafted of durable steel and coated with epoxy powder for a long-lasting finish
Customers appreciate the lightweight, compact design
cons: Many owners had to purchase new screws for the product
A little expensive despite its smaller size

customer_reviews.title: Fun storage piece
customer_reviews.text: I love IKEA for almost any usage. I saw this storage cart in a design magazine and bought two of them, one in the reddish-brown color and one in black. I use one in my bathroom for towels and storage canisters and one in my bedroom/office to hold supplies. They are industrial chic, roomy, and portable. Do note that if you are near an IKEA brick and mortar store, you can save quite a bit by just going there and buying it directly (close to half the cost at Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia P

customer_reviews.title: This card was super easy to assemble but very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This card was super easy to assemble but very sturdy, gorgeous powder coated finish and I will say one of the best quality for the $$ purchases I have ever made. I will seek this company out the next time I need something like this and have already referred 2 family members who saw the cart and loved it as much as I do
customer_reviews.author: Julia Zavacky

customer_reviews.title: I love the design and enjoy the color
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and enjoy the color. I can't to get to use it. Upon assembling the cart it became obvious that not everything is square. I will still use the cart, just wish it were square and therefore easier to assemble correctly.
customer_reviews.author: mom1982

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Useful
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these, and they work very well. They are sturdy, and easy to assemble. The middle shelf is adjustable, if you loosen the clamp with the supplied wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: easy to install but you need small screwdriver in the ...
customer_reviews.text: easy to install but you need small screwdriver in the beginning of the installation. I don't have it so I used small scissor instead.
customer_reviews.author: Pin Hui Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far! High quality and exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.author: Jamie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great little cart!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little cart; sturdy and versatile! A bit challenging to put together, but diligence pays! Plan to use this to store sewing supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Woman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Lovely. Great color; very sturdy; easy to assemble; completely functional and roomy. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Sandy

customer_reviews.title: The holes on the side posts were not drilled symetrically ...
customer_reviews.text: The holes on the side posts were not drilled symetrically, so the tray leans to one side and the side post sticks up over the top on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Cart; well built.
customer_reviews.text: Great cart! It is an Ikea cart, made out of sturdy metal and goes together very well. Perfect for bringing food from the kitchen to the deck for cook-outs!
customer_reviews.author: Datapath

customer_reviews.title: excellent product. well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: excellent product. well made and sturdy. i thought it would be a little larger, but it's all right for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: diane gongaware

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Came with a piece of powder coating chipped off at the top of one side rail. Otherwise great cart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I already had the blue one and needed another one. Each our of kids now has his own cart and it is their 'station' for all of their school and extracurricular stuff (backpacks, lunch bags, gloves, hats, sunscreen etc..). You are paying nearly double the cost of what Ikea charges but I figured if I drove there I would probably fill up a whole cart with things I don't really need so I still came out ahead here! My husband had it assembled in under 45 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: MomWithAnAmazonProblem

customer_reviews.title: Strong, beautiful, & easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This cart is just as strong & sturdy as I had hoped. The assembly instructions were super easy. I'm so glad I got two! This was my first Ikea experience. I will definitely be purchasing more in the future. The description said that the color is "red." It's really more of a deep rust color. I love the color, I just wouldn't advertise it as red. If someone was hoping for a fire engine red, they would be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Hafen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted sitting by my "ice box" (Ha! That dated me! NO, I'm not THAT old-- but my parents called it that)- I have bananas etc. , potatoes and onions in it...It's cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: is Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: This cart, is Fantastic! !!Great for crafts. Easy to put together. Real-Sterdy,steel,heavy duty rollers. And I just Love the color..I have the burnt orange. I'm going to buy more. Great idea..
customer_reviews.author: Marciapayne23

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS! I use it as an art cart ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS! I use it as an art cart - i added my brushes, pens, etc to it and i can wheel it around my studio. The color is awesome and it is sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Zombie Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my crafts and it works awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart!! Very sturdy and love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Cosmolaroo121

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Little Carts.
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful little carts. We have three of them we use in the motorhome they fit neatly in small places. But, we bought ours at IKEA online for under $30.00 each.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Mess

product_meta.title: Raskog Home Kitchen Storage Utility cart-Red
product_meta.description: The sturdy construction and four casters make it easy for you to move the cart and use it wherever you like. It even fits in tight spaces because of its small size. You can use the cart in different ways, including as an extra work area in the kitchen, as practical storage in the hall or as a different nightstand in your bedroom. The adjustable middle section is easy to move to adapt to different storage needs.
feature_bullets: Color: Red orange, material: steel, epoxy powder coating
Care instructions: wipe clean with a soft cloth dampened with water and a mild dish detergent or soap, if necessary
Wipe dry with a clean cloth

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars38 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
